options: gateway <n>|Filter by gateway name;peer-address <ip>|Filter by peer IP address
example:
Gateway: branch-vpn-1
Peer-Address: 10.20.30.40
Role: Initiator
State: Established

Tunnel: branch-vpn-1
State: Active
TX Packets: 152341
Encryption: AES-256-GCM

description: Display summary of all IPSec tunnels

example:
Codes: K - kernel, C - connected
S* 0.0.0.0/0 [10/0] via 192.168.1.1, wan1
C 10.10.10.0/24 is directly connected

Tunnel      Remote IP     State  Uptime
branch-hq   10.20.30.40   Up     12d 4h
branch-dc   10.20.30.50   Up     8d 2h

PEER    PROTOCOL  PUBLIC IP
vsmart  dtls      10.20.30.40
vbond   dtls      10.20.30.50
